---
title: "Data Sources"
---

Data for the project was collected from the following online resources:

1. Spanish flu (Chicago):  [www.Kaggle.com](https://www.kaggle.com/thepodclub/spanish-flu-dataset)

Description: Data contains information on 8034 mortality cases, with "Unique Point Identifier (fid)", case type as pneumonia (1) or flu/unknown(0), point-location of each death(x(m) and y(m)), and week when death was recorded (as of 9/28/1918), for all the cases. Data recorded was for 7 weeks, after a few months of onset of the disease. 

2. COVID-19 (Chicago): [data.cityofchicago.org](https://data.cityofchicago.org/Health-Human-Services/COVID-19-Daily-Cases-Deaths-and-Hospitalizations/naz8-j4nc/data)

3. SARS 2003 (Global): [WHO.int/csr/sars/](https://www.who.int/csr/sars/country/country2003_08_15.pdf?ua=1)

4. COVID-19 (Global): [covid19.who.int/table](https://covid19.who.int/table)

5. HINI : [apps.who.int/flumart](https://apps.who.int/flumart/Default?ReportNo=12)
